allCourses.title: Tafsir Al-Qur'an: Surah Al-Baqarah
allCourses.shortDescription: A comprehensive, verse-by-verse study of Surah Al-Baqarah, exploring classical Tafsir, spiritual lessons, and practical applications.
allCourses.fullDescription:
In this detailed intermediate-level Tafsir course, students will journey through Surah Al-Baqarah — the longest Surah in the Qur’an. This course includes:

  • Context (Asbāb an-Nuzūl) and background of each passage
  • Explanation based on classical Tafsir sources
  • Deep linguistic reflections and thematic insights
  • Practical lessons relevant to modern life

By the end of the course, you will gain a clearer understanding of Allah’s guidance and a deeper spiritual connection with the Qur’an.

instructor.name: Sheikh Ahmad Al-Mansour
instructor.bio: Renowned Qur’an teacher and scholar with over 20 years of experience in Tafsir and Islamic education.

lessons.title: Tafsir of Verses 1–5: Qualities of the Believers
Tafsir of Verses 6–16: Traits of the Hypocrites
Tafsir of Verses 17–20: Parables of Hypocrisy
Tafsir of Verses 21–29: Call to Worship
Tafsir of Verses 30–39: Story of Adam (AS)
Tafsir of Verses 40–46: Reminder to Bani Isra'il
Tafsir of Verses 47–59: Blessings and Warnings to Bani Isra'il
Tafsir of Verses 60–74: The Cow Incident
Tafsir of Verses 75–86: Breaking the Covenant & Altering Scripture

outline.title: Milestone 3: Story of Adam & Early Reminders

allCourses.title: Arabic Grammar Fundamentals (Nahw)
allCourses.shortDescription: Master the essential rules of Arabic syntax (النحو) — from sentence structure to case endings — designed for beginners and early intermediate students.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This practical beginner-to-intermediate course on Nahw (Arabic grammar) teaches you how Arabic sentences are built and how words relate to each other. The course covers:

  • Basic sentence types (nominal & verbal)
  • Case endings and how to recognise them in reading
  • Verb conjugation basics and verb-subject agreement
  • Important particles, idafa (possessive constructions), and common syntactic patterns

By the end of the course you'll be able to parse simple and medium-complexity Arabic sentences from classical and Qur'anic texts and write grammatically correct sentences with confidence.

instructor.name: Dr. Fatima Hassan
instructor.bio: Assistant professor of Arabic grammar with extensive teaching experience in Nahw and Qur’anic syntax.

lessons.title: Course Introduction & How to Use This Course
Arabic Script Review & Pronunciation for Grammar
Prepositions (حروف الجر) & Their Effects on Case
Demonstrative & Relative Pronouns (اسم الإشارة والاسم الموصول)
Verb Moods (الحالات الإنشائية) — Indicative, Subjunctive, Jussive
Particles of Emphasis & Restriction (إنما، فقط، حتى)
Dual & Plural Forms and Agreement Rules
Common Syntactic Errors & How to Avoid Them
Reading Qur'anic Examples: Applying Nahw to the Text
Transformations: From Simple to Complex Sentences

allCourses.title: Sahih Al-Bukhari: Selected Hadith
allCourses.shortDescription: A focused study of selected authentic hadith from Sahih al-Bukhari, covering meaning, chains of transmission, and practical application.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This intermediate-level course explores carefully chosen hadith from Sahih al-Bukhari. Each lesson examines the text, chain (isnād), classification, scholarly commentary, and contemporary application. The course equips students to understand hadith methodology and apply prophetic guidance in daily life.

  • Close reading of selected hadith with Arabic text and reliable translations
  • Explanation of the isnād and reasons for narrators' acceptance
  • Comparative commentary from classical and contemporary scholars
  • Practical lessons for worship, ethics, and community life

By the end of the course you will be able to analyse selected hadith, explain their legal and moral implications, and reference classical commentary responsibly.

instructor.name: Sheikh Abdullah Rahman
instructor.bio: Hadith scholar and teacher specialising in hadith methodology and practical application, with extensive experience teaching classical sources.

lessons.title: Course Introduction & How to Study Hadith
Introduction to Imam al-Bukhari & His Methodology
Hadith 2: Actions Are by Intentions — Commentary
Hadith 3: Principles of Charity and Spending
Hadith 5: Rights of Parents — Chain & Explanation
Hadith 6: Etiquette of Learning and Teachers
Hadith 13: Ethics of Trade and Contracts
Hadith 14: Legal Principles Derived from Hadith
Hadith 15: Manners of the Prophet (AS) — Case Studies
Hadith 16: Strategic Use of Hadith in Fiqh
Hadith 17: Women in Hadith — Contextual Study
Hadith 21: Trials, Patience & Reliance on God
Hadith 22: Ethics of War & Peace — Historical Context
Hadith 29: Preservation of the Sunnah — Transmission Issues
Review Session: Analytical Techniques for Hadith

allCourses.title: Web Development with React & Next.js
allCourses.shortDescription: Learn to build modern web applications using React and Next.js, with hands-on projects and industry best practices.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This intermediate-level web development course guides students through building modern, performant web applications using React and Next.js. The course covers:

  • React fundamentals and advanced concepts
  • Next.js for server-side rendering and static sites
  • State management, routing, and API integration
  • Project-based learning to build real-world applications

By the end of this course, students will be able to develop scalable web applications and understand the best practices of modern frontend development.

instructor.name: Yusuf Ibrahim
instructor.bio: Experienced web developer and instructor specializing in React, Next.js, and modern frontend technologies.

lessons.title: Styling with CSS Modules & Tailwind CSS
State Management with Redux & Context API
React Testing with Jest & React Testing Library
Final Project: Build a Full Web Application

allCourses.title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
allCourses.shortDescription: Learn the essentials of graphic design, including visual principles, tools, and real-world projects to build a strong portfolio.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This beginner-friendly course covers the foundations of graphic design. Students will learn:

  • Design principles: color theory, typography, composition
  • Software skills: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma
  • Branding, logo design, and visual identity
  • Practical projects to create a professional portfolio

By the end of this course, students will be able to design visually appealing graphics and understand the core principles of effective design.

instructor.name: Aisha Rahman
instructor.bio: Professional graphic designer and educator with over 10 years of experience in design, branding, and digital art.

allCourses.title: Digital Marketing Essentials
allCourses.shortDescription: A comprehensive beginner course on digital marketing covering SEO, social media, email campaigns, and analytics with real-world projects.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This beginner-friendly digital marketing course covers essential topics to launch and grow online campaigns. Students will learn:

  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and keyword research
  • Social media marketing strategies for major platforms
  • Email marketing, content creation, and branding
  • Analytics, conversion tracking, and campaign optimization
  • Practical projects and real-world case studies

By the end of the course, students will be able to plan, execute, and measure successful digital marketing campaigns.

instructor.name: Omar Abdullah
instructor.bio: Experienced digital marketing consultant with over 8 years of expertise in SEO, social media marketing, and online advertising.

lessons.title: Final Project: Launch a Complete Marketing Campaign

allCourses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
allCourses.shortDescription: Learn essential UI/UX principles, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing to design intuitive digital experiences.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This beginner-friendly UI/UX course teaches you how to design user-centered digital products. Topics include:

  • User research and personas
  • UI design principles and color psychology
  • Wireframing, prototyping, and Figma techniques
  • User testing and feedback analysis
  • Portfolio-ready projects

By the end, you’ll be able to design beautiful and functional interfaces confidently.

instructor.name: Sarah Mitchell
instructor.bio: Senior UX designer with 10+ years of experience building products for startups and global companies.

allCourses.title: Python Programming for Beginners
allCourses.shortDescription: Start coding with Python — learn basics, data types, loops, functions, and build real beginner-friendly projects.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This hands-on Python course is designed for those with zero coding experience. You will learn:

  • Variables, data types, loops, and conditionals
  • Functions, modules, and error handling
  • Working with files and data structures
  • Small projects and automation tasks
  • Final project: Build a Python mini-application

By the end, you will be able to write clean and efficient Python programs.

instructor.name: Jonathan Reed
instructor.bio: Software engineer and Python expert with 12+ years of teaching experience.

allCourses.title: Graphic Design Mastery
allCourses.shortDescription: Master Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and design principles to create professional-level graphics and branding materials.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This comprehensive graphic design program covers everything from design basics to advanced editing. You will learn:

  • Adobe Photoshop tools & workflows
  • Illustrator vector design techniques
  • Branding, typography & layout principles
  • Poster, logo, and social media design
  • Real-world design projects for your portfolio

Perfect for aspiring designers and content creators.

instructor.name: Michael Carter
instructor.bio: Professional graphic designer with 14+ years of branding and digital design experience.

allCourses.title: Arabic Grammar Mastery: Nahw Level 1
allCourses.shortDescription: A structured beginner-to-intermediate course covering essential Arabic grammar rules based on classical texts.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This beginner-friendly Arabic grammar course introduces students to the foundations of Nahw (syntax). Based on classical sources like Ajrumiyyah, students will master sentence structure, word analysis, and core grammatical rules with practical examples.

  • Clear explanations with examples from Qur'an & Hadith
  • Step-by-step mastery of core Nahw principles
  • Weekly quizzes and practical exercises
  • Ideal for students of Islamic studies and Arabic learners

By completing this course, learners will be able to understand and analyze Arabic sentences with confidence.

instructor.name: Ustadh Kareem Al-Hassani
instructor.bio: Expert Arabic linguist and Islamic studies teacher with 15+ years of teaching experience.

lessons.title: Importance of Nahw in Understanding Qur'an

allCourses.title: Islamic Youth Studies: Identity, Leadership & Modern Challenges
allCourses.shortDescription: A practical, inspiring course designed to empower Muslim youth with Islamic identity, leadership qualities, and resilience in a modern world.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This transformative Youth Studies course focuses on building a strong Muslim identity, leadership character, and spiritual discipline. It covers modern challenges that young Muslims face and provides prophetic solutions grounded in Qur’an & Sunnah.

  • Islamic identity & self-confidence
  • Leadership from the Prophetic model
  • Digital challenges & social media discipline
  • Mental resilience & emotional intelligence
  • Goal setting, productivity & time management

By the end, learners will be equipped to lead with confidence, navigate challenges wisely, and live as strong ambassadors of Islam.

instructor.name: Ustadh Hamza Rahman
instructor.bio: Youth mentor and Islamic motivational speaker who has guided thousands of young Muslims around the world.

lessons.title: Who Am I? Understanding Muslim Identity
Purpose of Life Through Qur’anic Lens
Pillars of Strong Faith for Youth
Qualities of Youth Mentioned in Qur'an
The Heart in Islam: Purification & Strength
Protecting the Heart in the Digital World
Being a Role Model in Society
Action Steps for the Next 30 Days

allCourses.title: Muslim Youth Character Building Program
allCourses.shortDescription: A complete tarbiyah program focusing on character purification, manners, self-discipline, and Islamic personality development.
allCourses.fullDescription:
This Islamic Character Building Program for Youth is designed to develop sincerity, manners, emotional strength, and Islamic personality based on Qur’an and Sunnah.

  • Building strong Islamic morals
  • Mental & emotional discipline
  • Social manners & etiquette
  • Overcoming desires & temptations
  • Prophetic akhlaq & real-life applications

By the end of this course, youth will rise as confident, responsible, and spiritually disciplined Muslims.

instructor.name: Shaykh Mustafa Al-Hakim
instructor.bio: Islamic teacher and tarbiyah mentor specializing in youth development and character training for 12+ years.

lessons.title: Dealing with Anger As a Muslim
